6 BasicGeometriesNode::BasicGeometriesNode()
7 {
8  // initialize all topic and frame with file vito_controllers.yaml
9  nh = ros::NodeHandle("BasicGeometriesNode_node");
10  nh.param<std::string>("/BasicGeometriesNode/camera_topic", camera_topic_, "/scene_filter/scene_filtered");
11 
12  nh.param<std::string>("/BasicGeometriesNode/objects_topic", objects_topic_, "/BasicGeometriesNode/object_cloud");
13  cloud_object_publisher_ = nh.advertise<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> >( objects_topic_.c_str(), 1 );
14 
15  nh.param<std::string>("/BasicGeometriesNode/makers_topic", objects_topic_, "/BasicGeometriesNode/markers");
16  marker_publisher_ = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker >( objects_topic_.c_str(), 0 );
17 
18  std::string topic = nh.resolveName(camera_topic_.c_str());
19  stream_subscriber_ = nh.subscribe(topic, 1, &BasicGeometriesNode::BasicGeometriesNodeCallback, this);
20 
21  nh.param<std::string>("/BasicGeometriesNode/geometries_topic", geometries_topic_, "/BasicGeometriesNode/geometries");
22  geometries_publisher_ = nh.advertise<desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray>( geometries_topic_.c_str(), 1 );
23 
24  nh.param<std::string>("/BasicGeometriesNode/cylinder_names", object_names_, "object");
25  nh.param<int>("/BasicGeometriesNode/cluster_tolerance", min_cluster_size_, 200);
26  nh.param<double>("/BasicGeometriesNode/min_cluster_size", cluster_tolerance_, 0.07);
27 
28 
29 }

31 void BasicGeometriesNode::BasicGeometriesNodeCallback(sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 msg)
32 {
33  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr OriginalScene (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
34  pcl::fromROSMsg (msg, *OriginalScene);
35  camera_frame_ = OriginalScene->header.frame_id;
36 
37  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr > cluster_vector = getClusters( OriginalScene );
38 
39  std::vector<geometry> geometries;
40 
41  if ( cluster_vector.size() > 0)
42  {
43  for (unsigned int i=0; i < cluster_vector.size(); i++)
44  {
45  geometry new_geometry = fitGeometry( cluster_vector[i] );
46  if (new_geometry.geom_type >= 0)
47  {
48  geometries.push_back( new_geometry );
49  }
50  }
51  }
52 
53  // ROS_DEBUG("Number of geometries %lu", geometries.size());
54 
55  if ( geometries.size() > 0 )
56  {
57  generateMarkerMessages( geometries );
58  generateGeometriesMessages( geometries );
59  // printGometriesInfo( geometries );
60  }
61 }

63 std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr > BasicGeometriesNode::getClusters( pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr OriginalScene )
64 {
65  // Make a cluster with euclidean clusters
66  // Creating the KdTree object for the search method of the extraction
67  std::vector<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr > cluster_vector;
68  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
69  tree->setInputCloud (OriginalScene);
70 
71  // ROS_DEBUG("PointCloud in getClusters() has: %lu data points.", cloud_filtered->points.size ());
72  std::vector<pcl::PointIndices> cluster_indices;
73  pcl::EuclideanClusterExtraction<pcl::PointXYZRGBA> euclidean_cluster;
74  euclidean_cluster.setClusterTolerance (cluster_tolerance_); // 5cm
75  euclidean_cluster.setMinClusterSize (min_cluster_size_);
76  euclidean_cluster.setMaxClusterSize (OriginalScene->points.size());
77  euclidean_cluster.setSearchMethod (tree);
78  euclidean_cluster.setInputCloud (OriginalScene);
79  euclidean_cluster.extract (cluster_indices);
80 
81  ROS_DEBUG("Number of clusters %lu", cluster_indices.size());
82 
83  // from cluster[i] to point_cloud
84  if (cluster_indices.size() > 0)
85  {
86 
87  cluster_vector.clear();
88 
89  for (std::vector<pcl::PointIndices>::const_iterator it = cluster_indices.begin (); it != cluster_indices.end (); ++it)
90  {
91  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr cloud_cluster (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>);
92 
93  cloud_cluster->width = cloud_cluster->points.size ();
94  cloud_cluster->height = 1;
95  cloud_cluster->is_dense = true;
96  cloud_cluster->header.frame_id = OriginalScene->header.frame_id;
97 
98  for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator pit = it->indices.begin (); pit != it->indices.end (); ++pit)
99  {
100 
101  cloud_cluster->points.push_back (OriginalScene->points[*pit]);
102 
103  }
104 
105  cluster_vector.push_back(cloud_cluster);
106  }
107  }
108 
109  // ROS_INFO("Size cluster_vector %lu", cluster_vector.size());
110  // for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cluster_vector.size() ; ++i)
111  // {
112  // ROS_INFO("Num of points in cluster %d is %lu", i, cluster_vector[i]->points.size());
113  // }
114 
115  return cluster_vector;
116 }

118 BasicGeometriesNode::geometry BasicGeometriesNode::fitGeometry( pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGBA>::Ptr OriginalCluster ){
119 
120  //std::vector<BasicGeometriesNode::geometry> new_geometry;
121  //new_geometry.resize(2); // 2 is the number of geometry that i can try to fit
122  BasicGeometriesNode::geometry cyl_geometry;
123  // double ratio_cyl;
124  // double ratio_sphere;
125  // BasicGeometriesNode::geometry sphere_geometry;
126 
127  // TODO Here we can implement more BAsic Geometries.
128  BasicGeometries::cylinder cylinder_local( OriginalCluster );
129 
130  if( cylinder_local.fitCylinder() )
131  {
132  //Cube = 1, Sphere = 2, Cylinder = 3, Cone = 11
133  cyl_geometry.geom_type = 3;
134  std::vector<double> cyl_info = cylinder_local.getInfo();
135  double radius = cyl_info[0];
136  cyl_geometry.geom_info = cyl_info;
137  cyl_geometry.geom_info_marker.push_back( radius * 2 );
138  cyl_geometry.geom_info_marker.push_back( radius * 2 );
139  double height = cyl_info[1];
140  cyl_geometry.geom_info_marker.push_back( height );
141  cyl_geometry.geom_transformation = cylinder_local.getTransformation();
142  cyl_geometry.geom_info.push_back(cyl_info[cyl_info.size() -1]); //ratio
143  return cyl_geometry;
144  }
145 
146  // BasicGeometries::sphere sphere_local( OriginalCluster );
147  // if( sphere_local.fitSphere() )
148  // {
149  // sphere_geometry.geom_type = 2;
150  // std::vector<double> cyl_info = sphere_local.getInfo();
151  // double radius = cyl_info[0];
152  // sphere_geometry.geom_info = cyl_info;
153  // sphere_geometry.geom_info_marker.push_back( radius );
154  // sphere_geometry.geom_info_marker.push_back( radius );
155  // sphere_geometry.geom_info_marker.push_back( radius );
156  // sphere_geometry.geom_transformation = sphere_local.getTransformation();
157  // // ratio_sphere = cyl_info[cyl_info.size() -1];
158  // return sphere_geometry;
159  // }
160

162  // {
163  return cyl_geometry;
164  // }

166  // {
167  // return sphere_geometry;
168  // }
169

173 void BasicGeometriesNode::generateMarkerMessages( std::vector<geometry> geometries )
174 {
175  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < geometries.size(); ++i)
176  {
177  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
178  marker.header.frame_id = camera_frame_.c_str();
179  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time();
180  marker.ns = "";
181  marker.id = i;
182  marker.type = geometries[i].geom_type;
183  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
184  geometry_msgs::Pose pose = fromEigenMatrix4x4ToPose ( geometries[i].geom_transformation );
185  marker.pose.position.x = pose.position.x;
186  marker.pose.position.y = pose.position.y;
187  marker.pose.position.z = pose.position.z;
188  marker.pose.orientation.x = pose.orientation.x;
189  marker.pose.orientation.y = pose.orientation.y;
190  marker.pose.orientation.z = pose.orientation.z;
191  marker.pose.orientation.w = pose.orientation.w;
192 
193  marker.scale.x = geometries[i].geom_info_marker[0];
194  marker.scale.y = geometries[i].geom_info_marker[1];
195  marker.scale.z = geometries[i].geom_info_marker[2];
196 
197  marker.color.a = 1.0; // for the clearness
198  marker.color.r = 0.0;
199  marker.color.g = 0.0;
200  marker.color.b = 1.0;
201  marker.lifetime = ros::Duration(1);
202  marker_publisher_.publish(marker);
203 
204  std::string cyl_name= object_names_.c_str() + std::string("_") + std::to_string(i);
205 
206  tf::Transform tfGeomTRansform;
207  tf::poseMsgToTF( fromEigenMatrix4x4ToPose( geometries[i].geom_transformation ), tfGeomTRansform );
208  tf_geometriesTransformations_.sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform( tfGeomTRansform, ros::Time::now(), camera_frame_.c_str(), cyl_name.c_str()) );
209  }
210 }
211 
212 void BasicGeometriesNode::generateGeometriesMessages( std::vector<geometry> geometries){
213 
214  //send a geometry information (type, pose, info)
215  desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesArray fittedGeometriesArrayMsg;
216 
217  for (unsigned int i=0; i < geometries.size(); i++)
218  {
219  desperate_housewife::fittedGeometriesSingle fittedGeometriesSingleMsg;
220  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.type = geometries[i].geom_type;
221  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.pose = fromEigenMatrix4x4ToPose( geometries[i].geom_transformation );
222  // std::cout<<"pose in fitting: "<< geometries[i].geom_transformation <<std::endl;
223  for (unsigned j=0; j < geometries[i].geom_info.size(); j++)
224  {
225  fittedGeometriesSingleMsg.info.push_back(geometries[i].geom_info[j]);
226  }
227  fittedGeometriesArrayMsg.geometries.push_back( fittedGeometriesSingleMsg );
228  }
229 
230  geometries_publisher_.publish(fittedGeometriesArrayMsg);
231  return;
232 }
233 
234 geometry_msgs::Pose BasicGeometriesNode::fromEigenMatrix4x4ToPose( Eigen::Matrix4d &tranfs_matrix )
235 {
236 
237  geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
238  Eigen::Quaterniond eugen_quat(tranfs_matrix.block<3,3>(0,0));
239  pose.orientation.x = eugen_quat.x();
240  pose.orientation.y = eugen_quat.y();
241  pose.orientation.z = eugen_quat.z();
242  pose.orientation.w = eugen_quat.w();
243  pose.position.x = tranfs_matrix(0,3);
244  pose.position.y = tranfs_matrix(1,3);
245  pose.position.z = tranfs_matrix(2,3);
246 
247  return pose;
248 }

251 void BasicGeometriesNode::printGometriesInfo ( std::vector<geometry> geometries )
252 {
253  ROS_INFO("Number of geometries %lu", geometries.size());
254  //only per print the cylinder's informations
255  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < geometries.size(); ++i)
256  {
257  if (geometries[i].geom_type == 3)
258  {
259  ROS_INFO("Number of parameters %lu in geometry %u", geometries[i].geom_info.size(), i);
260  ROS_INFO("radius = %f", geometries[i].geom_info[0]);
261  ROS_INFO("height = %f", geometries[i].geom_info[1]);
262  ROS_INFO("isLying = %f", geometries[i].geom_info[2]);
263  ROS_INFO("isFull = %f", geometries[i].geom_info[3]);
264  ROS_INFO("ratio = %f", geometries[i].geom_info[4]);
265  ROS_INFO(" ");
266  }
267  else
268  {
269  ROS_INFO("Geometry %u is not a cylinder", i);
270  }
271  }
272 }
